MetaData.Description: NOTE: Prototype only. Dairy farm mangnager component base on simple rules created by Dawn Dally of DairyNZ

variable.name: RemainingFeedDemand
variable.description: ME still required to meet animal requirements

variable.name: TotalCows
variable.description: Total animal requirements [MJME] (for the full herd)

variable.name: TotalFeedDemand
variable.description: Total animal requirements [MJME] (for the full herd)

variable.name: StockingRate
variable.description: Stocking is the actual number of cows on farm i.e. normal stocking rate less cows wintering off

variable.name: PeakStockingRate
variable.description: Stocking rate a peak of lactation

variable.name: ME_Demand_Total
variable.description: Total Metabolisable energy required by herd [MJME/day]

variable.name: ME_Demand_Maintance
variable.description: Metabolisable energy required by herd for maintance [MJME/day]

variable.name: ME_Demand_Lactation
variable.description: Metabolisable energy required by herd for lactation [MJME/day]

variable.name: ME_Demand_Pregnancy
variable.description: Metabolisable energy required by herd for pregnancy [MJME/day]

variable.name: ME_Demand_Walking
variable.description: Metabolisable energy required by herd for walking [MJME/day]

variable.name: ME_Demand_WeightChange
variable.description: Metabolisable energy required by herd for live weight change [MJME/day]

variable.name: ME_Demand_WeightChange_Cow
variable.description: Metabolisable energy required for live weight change [MJME/cow/day]

variable.name: Cow_dLWt
variable.description: Average cows change in live weight

variable.name: SilageCut
variable.description: Quantity of silage cut on farm today

variable.name: SilageCut_kgha
variable.description: Quantity of silage cut on farm today

variable.name: SilageDigestability
variable.description: Silage digestability (could this be made read only once the store has been refactored)

variable.name: CR
variable.description: Conservation cutting residual pasture mass (Dawn default = 1600)

variable.name: FCD
variable.description: First Conservation Date - uing a month for the time being

variable.name: LCD
variable.description: Last Conservation Date - uing a month for the time being

variable.name: SilageME
variable.description: Energy content of silage produced on farm

variable.name: SilageN
variable.description: Nitrogen content of silage produced on farm

variable.name: SilageWastage
variable.description: Proportion of silage lost during feeding out

variable.name: SilageStoreEnable
variable.description: Storage of cut silage on farm (for later use)

variable.name: SilageStore
variable.description: Amount of silage avalible for feeding out [kgDM]

variable.name: SilageStore_kgha
variable.description: Amount of silage avalible for feeding out [kgDM]

variable.name: ConservationTrigger
variable.description: Conservation trigger mass (close paddocks above this residual)

variable.name: ME_Eaten_Pasture_Pdks
variable.description: Energy consumed as pasture per paddock

variable.name: ME_Eaten_Supplement_Pdks
variable.description: Energy consumed as Supplements per paddock

variable.name: DM_Eaten_Pdks
variable.description: Total Dry matter consumed per paddock [kgDM/day]

variable.name: DM_Eaten_Pasture_Pdks
variable.description: Dry matter consumed as pasture per paddock

variable.name: DM_Eaten_Supplement_Pdks
variable.description: Dry matter consumed as supplement per paddock

variable.name: N_Eaten_Pasture_Pdks
variable.description: Nitrogen consumed as pasture per paddock

variable.name: N_Eaten_Supplement_Pdks
variable.description: Nitrogen consumed as supplement per paddock

variable.name: N_to_milk_Pdks
variable.description: Nitrogen partitioned to milk per paddock

variable.name: N_to_BC_Pdks
variable.description: Nitrogen partitioned to body contition per paddock

variable.name: N_to_feaces_Pdks
variable.description: Nitrogen partitioned to dung per paddock

variable.name: N_to_urine_Pdks
variable.description: Nitrogen partitioned to urine per paddock

variable.name: ME_Eaten_Pasture_Cow
variable.description: Energy consumed as pasture per cow

variable.name: ME_Eaten_Supplement_Cow
variable.description: Energy consumed as supplement per cow

variable.name: DM_Eaten_Pasture_Cow
variable.description: Dry matter consumed as pasture per cow

variable.name: DM_Eaten_Supplement_Cow
variable.description: Dry matter consumed as supplement per cow

variable.name: N_Eaten_Pasture_Cow
variable.description: Nitrogen consumed as pasture per cow

variable.name: N_Eaten_Supplement_Cow
variable.description: Nitrogen consumed as supplement per cow

variable.name: N_to_milk_Cow
variable.description: Nitrogen partitioned to milk per cow

variable.name: N_to_BC_Cow
variable.description: Nitrogen partitioned to body condition per cow

variable.name: N_to_feaces_Cow
variable.description: Nitrogen partitioned to dung per cow

variable.name: N_to_urine_Cow
variable.description: Nitrogen partitioned to urine per cow

variable.name: LWt_Change_Cow
variable.description: Daily per cow live weight change
